overview: From 2025-06-15 to 2025-06-22, elizaos-plugins/plugin-farcaster had 3 new PRs (2 merged), 0 new issues, and 11 active contributors.

topIssues.title: error on enable post and dryrun settings
topIssues.author: Icarus-Community
topIssues.body:
hi, i have setup the following in .env

FARCASTER_DRY_RUN=false	#Run in simulation mode without posting (true/false)	false
MAX_CAST_LENGTH	Maximum=320  #length of casts	320
FARCASTER_POLL_INTERVAL=180	#Interval for checking mentions (minutes)	2
ENABLE_POST=true	#Enable automatic posting (true/false)	true
POST_INTERVAL_MIN=120	#Minimum time between posts (minutes)	90
POST_INTERVAL_MAX=720	#Maximum time between posts (minutes)	180
ENABLE_ACTION_PROCESSING=true 	#Enable processing interactions (true/false)	false
ACTION_INTERVAL=120	#Interval for processing actions (minutes)	5
POST_IMMEDIATELY=true	#Post immediately on startup (true/false)	false
MAX_ACTIONS_PROCESSING=2	#Maximum actions to process in one cycle	1
#ACTION_TIMELINE_TYPE=	#Type of timeline to use for actions	ForYou

but recieve the following error on start up:

[2025-05-23 06:59:38] ERROR: Error starting agent for character Supah:
[2025-05-23 06:59:38] ERROR:
    err: {
      "type": "Error",
      "message": "Farcaster configuration validation failed:\nFARCASTER_DRY_RUN: Required\nENABLE_POST: Required",
      "stack":
          Error: Farcaster configuration validation failed:
          FARCASTER_DRY_RUN: Required
          ENABLE_POST: Required
              at validateFarcasterConfig (file:///root/elizaos/eliza/packages/plugin-farcaster/dist/index.js:812:19)
              at Object.start (file:///root/elizaos/eliza/packages/plugin-farcaster/dist/index.js:854:39)
              at initializeClients (file:///root/elizaos/eliza/agent/src/index.ts:465:56)
              at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:105:5)
              at async startAgent (file:///root/elizaos/eliza/agent/src/index.ts:577:27)
              at async startAgents (file:///root/elizaos/eliza/agent/src/index.ts:644:13)
    }


any help is appreciated

topPRs.title: Replace 'post' terminology with 'cast' throughout codebase
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
This pull request introduces a major terminology shift, replacing "Post" with "Cast" throughout the codebase to align with updated Farcaster conventions. Key changes include renaming variables, methods, and configuration settings, as well as updating tests and constants to reflect this change.

### Terminology Shift: "Post" to "Cast"

#### Configuration Updates:
* Renamed environment variables and constants, such as `ENABLE_POST` to `ENABLE_CAST`, and `POST_INTERVAL_MIN/MAX` to `CAST_INTERVAL_MIN/MAX` in `env.example` and `src/common/constants.ts`. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-0521255bbda96fd681ef7be9c0d23f04cb3838b3a905ed7f25b041ec34cf547cL23-R37) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-118a1ed2ebf5b946c94c5dfeae1c4d13c9a57ef105b36ad323e0b7b8e368da27L5-R6)
* Updated Farcaster configuration validation logic to use "Cast" terminology, including `CAST_IMMEDIATELY` and `CAST_INTERVAL_MIN/MAX`. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-9d5ba1a74fa3c1ca2e89c9b7a2c356807802c8b5be7473377ffd4d9ab348aef1L52-R63) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-9d5ba1a74fa3c1ca2e89c9b7a2c356807802c8b5be7473377ffd4d9ab348aef1L75-R77) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-9d5ba1a74fa3c1ca2e89c9b7a2c356807802c8b5be7473377ffd4d9ab348aef1L106-R112)

#### Service Method Renaming:
* Replaced `getPostService` with `getCastService` and updated method calls accordingly in `src/__tests__/e2e/scenarios.ts` and `src/actions/sendCast.ts`. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-4f8b499b94e10dffdbf9c5452f0700b0f5baf90708347ce4e39fc517450db8d2L16-R23) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-e69989583a3b65be56145dc20b188747136f4d0ee3a7a83ff23bd6daa6f8207aL54-R65)

#### Test Updates:
* Refactored unit and end-to-end tests to use "Cast" terminology, including method names and assertions in `src/__tests__/unit/config.test.ts` and `src/__tests__/e2e/scenarios.ts`. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-4861df73bfbf77cbcc89c8c5b2360e8100d2121c22279c8b3e132980ff9b2619L55-R59) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-4861df73bfbf77cbcc89c8c5b2360e8100d2121c22279c8b3e132980ff9b2619L89-R94)

#### Type Adjustments:
* Updated message types from `MessageType.POST` and `MessageType.REPLY` to string literals `'post'` and `'reply'` for improved clarity and alignment with the new terminology. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-43ae128d53bc87c98e7c25a7957456d10da53616ffb8818469931b4a1cac4317L521-R520) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-43ae128d53bc87c98e7c25a7957456d10da53616ffb8818469931b4a1cac4317L563-R562)

topPRs.title: refactor: update Farcaster nomenclature from 'post' to 'cast'
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
## Summary
This PR refactors the Farcaster plugin to use proper Farcaster-native "cast" terminology instead of generic "post" terminology, while maintaining full backward compatibility with existing integrations.

## Key Changes
- **File Structure**: Renamed `PostService.ts` ‚Üí `CastService.ts`
- **Class Names**: `FarcasterPostService` ‚Üí `FarcasterCastService`
- **Internal Variables**: Updated all internal variable names (`post` ‚Üí `cast`, `posts` ‚Üí `casts`)
- **Configuration**: Updated config keys (`ENABLE_POST` ‚Üí `ENABLE_CAST`, `POST_INTERVAL_*` ‚Üí `CAST_INTERVAL_*`, etc.)
- **Logging**: All internal log messages now use "cast" terminology
- **Tests**: Updated test files to use new terminology and configuration
- **Types**: Added `FarcasterMessageType` enum with `CAST` and `REPLY` values

## Backward Compatibility ‚úÖ
- **Preserved**: All `IPostService` interface methods (`createPost`, `getPost`, `getPosts`, etc.)
- **Preserved**: Method signatures and return types
- **Preserved**: `getPostService()` method still works alongside new `getCastService()`
- **No Breaking Changes**: External consumers continue to work without modification

## Technical Details
- Created local interface definitions for missing `@elizaos/core` exports
- Updated event types (`POST_GENERATED` ‚Üí `CAST_GENERATED`)
- Maintained service compatibility with both old and new method names
- All internal Farcaster code now uses proper "cast" terminology

## Test Results
- ‚úÖ Build: `bun run build` passes
- ‚úÖ Tests: All 16 component tests pass
- ‚úÖ TypeScript: No compilation errors
- ‚úÖ Linting: Code follows project standards

## Migration Impact
**For Plugin Users**: No action required - all existing code continues to work
**For Plugin Developers**: Can now use `getCastService()` for cleaner Farcaster-native code

This refactoring brings the codebase in line with Farcaster's native terminology while ensuring zero disruption to existing integrations.

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

- **New Features**
	- Introduced a Cast Service for managing Farcaster social media casts, including creation, retrieval, and interaction features.
- **Refactor**
	- Replaced all "post" terminology with "cast" across the app to align with Farcaster's language.
	- Updated service, manager, and configuration names and methods to use "cast" instead of "post".
	- Deprecated the old post service getter in favor of a new cast service getter.
- **Documentation**
	- Updated README and in-code documentation to reflect the new "cast" terminology and configuration.
- **Tests**
	- Added comprehensive unit tests for cast-related types and configuration.
	- Updated test scenarios to use "cast" terminology.
	- Removed outdated tests related to the old post service and configuration.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
